summary: Implements a mock version of the AWS Lake Formation service for the Moto testing framework, defining custom error types, in‑memory data models for tags, resources and permissions, and request handlers that translate Lake Formation API calls into simulated backend operations and JSON responses.
business_intent: Allows developers to write and run unit or integration tests that involve Lake Formation functionality without accessing real AWS resources, ensuring faster, cost‑free and isolated testing of data‑lake permission and tagging logic.
